segments.text: Hi , this is China Southern Airlines . Is that Miss . Ye ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , speaking . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am responsible for verifying your information before you come for the interview . What , uh , position do you want ... uh ... to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pardon ? Your way of articulating is too slow . Would you speak a little faster ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , I am used to speaking in a slow pace , but I will try to be faster . What position do you want to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been yearning for a job as a stewardess in an airline like yours .
segments.speaker: S2
